name: Tetrong
description:
The game that started it all.

In April we participated in a LD mini jam, the theme Pong. Adam came up with the idea of a Tetris/Pong hybrid. We were unable to produce a completed game that weekend. All was not lost though... I got bored at the beginning of June and started working on it again. This is the prototype/proof of concept I got done. This game was made to prove to myself that I could do it.

No copyright or trademark infringement is intended with this game. It was made for fun and educational purposes.
